name: Ark Survive
description:
40 days, 1 Ark, 100 problems

Hundreds of decisions, just one good ending.

The fate of the world depends on your decisions.

Hi!
Me and 4 of my friends gathered around to participate in LD46 gamejam. We decided to make a story driven game keeping in mind the subject of this event “Keep it Alive”. In our game you’ll be playing as Noe trying to keep as many animals on the Arc as possible. Remember choices matter, they are going to guide you and hopefully make you laugh on the way.

We created all the graphics. For music and sound effects, we used copyright free sources.

TEAM
- Kamil Florek - 2d artist
- Małgorzata Stępień - 2d artist/Script Writer
- Krzysztof Tomaszek - Game Designer/Programmer/Script Writer
- Patryk Szczesiak - Programmer/Script Writer
- Dariusz Wójcicki -Script Writer/Music director
